food.name: Margherita Pizza
food.description: A classic margherita pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.

food.name: California Roll
food.description: A sushi roll with crab, avocado, and cucumber, topped with sesame seeds.

food.name: Cheeseburger
food.description: A juicy cheeseburger with cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles.

food.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
food.description: Spaghetti pasta in a creamy egg and Parmesan sauce with pancetta.

food.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
food.description: Grilled chicken pieces in a spiced curry sauce with tomatoes and cream.

food.name: Pad Thai
food.description: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, peanuts, bean sprouts, and eggs.

food.name: Falafel Wrap
food.description: A wrap filled with crispy falafel, hummus, lettuce, tomatoes, and tahini sauce.

food.name: Caesar Salad
food.description: Romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.

food.name: Fish Tacos
food.description: Tacos with grilled fish, cabbage slaw, avocado, and a spicy mayo sauce.

food.name: Tiramisu
food.description: A classic Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.
